Class CollectionHandle<T>

A handle on a set of Entity data. Note that, as a set, a Collection can only contain a single version of an Entity for each given ID. Further, no order is implied by the set.

Type parameters

  • T: Entity

Hierarchy

  • PreEntityMutationHandle<CRDTCollectionTypeRecord<SerializedEntity>>
